supportDesc.condition: The codex is in precarious conservation conditions. The ink is smudged on . Creases, tears, stains (for example on ), and insects droppings are present. Humidity infiltrated from the top margin of has washed off the ink at the top of the text. The leather cover shows abrasions, tears, and losses so that the corners of the wooden boards are exposed. The spine is torn. The sewing is broken and thread lengths are lost. The headband is broken and lacks some fragments. The tailband is missing.

item.desc: , followed by one unidentified stanza (ፍሬ፡ ከናፍርየ፡ ገርሐ፤ ወሰላምየ፡ አምኃ፤ ዓቄርብ፡ ለከ፡ ሠርከ፡ ወነግሐ፤…), the first and third stanzas of , and the last stanza of .

q.seg: ሰላም፡ ለዝክረ፡ ስ፤ምከ፡ ዘሰሌዳ፡ ሞገ፤ስ፡ መጽሐፉ፡ ዘያሜኒ፡ ኵሎ፡ ወያስተሴፉ፡ ጥዑመ፡ ዜና፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ለሐሊበ፡ እጐልት፡ ሱታፉ፡ ሰላመከ፡ ወረድኤትከ፡ በላዕሌየ፡ ያእርፉ፡ አኮ፡ ለምዕር፡ ዳዕሙ፡ ለዝላፉ፨
አፍጣኒተ፡ ረድኤት፤ ማርያም፡ በጊዜ፡ ምንዳቤ፡ ወሐጸባ፤ ለዓይን፡ እምቀራንባ፤ አንቲ፡ ውእቱ፡ ረድኤተ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ በቤተ፡ ላባ፤ እምኵሉ፡ ሕሊናከሐ፡ ወእምኵሉ፡ አልባባ፤ ዘኢታፈቅረኪ፡ ነፍስ፡ ትሴፎ፡ እምሕዝባ፤
በረከተ፡ ሌዊ፡ ወይሁዳ፡ እለ፡ እሙንቱ፡ ጕንደ፡ መንግሥት፡ ወክህነት፨ በረከተ፡ ኄኖክ፡ ወኤልያስ፡ ወእዝራ፤ ወኵሎሙ፡ እለ፡ ሀለው፡ ብሔረ፡ ሕያዋን፨ በረከተ፡ ዳዊት፡ ወሰሎሞን፡ ጠቢባን፨
በረከተ፡ ክልኤሆሙ፡ ሰንበታት፨ በረከተ፡ ቅድስት፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፨ በረከተ፡ ሥጋሁ፡ ወደሙ፡ በረከተ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ ማርያም። በረከትኪ፡ ወበረከተ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ይኩን፡ ምስለ፡ ኃጥእት፡ ገብርኪ፡ ዘወልደ፡ ማርያም፡

item.desc: A white sticker is glued to the inner side of the front board. The signature ‘MS. Eth. E.U. IV’ and the brief description ‘Arganona Wǝddase 17th cent.’ is written in pencil on it.

binding.decoNote: The book is bound in wooden boards covered with dark brown blind-tooled leather. The inner sides of both boards are decorated with textile inlays featuring a floral motif outlined in yellow, white and green on a blue background.
The boards are flush with the bookblock and present external shallow bevels.

Full dark-brown leather cover. The turn-ins have been trimmed out and at the corners they form butt mitres. Additional leather patches fill the gap between the turn-ins. The cover shows a blind-tooled decoration, identical on both sides of the cover. The turn-ins and the edges are decorated as well. The decoration consists of five concentric frames surrounding a central rectangular panel featuring a Latin cross. Frames composed by the repetition of single tools, enclosed between triple straight lines, alternate with empty ones. Proceeding from the outer to the inner frame, the repeating decoration motifs are criss-crosses, wavy lines, and straight strapwork elements. The cross is formed by X-form motifs between triple straight lines. At the ends of the arms of the cross there are corniform motifs and six double circles. Triple straight lines outline the shape of the cross, dividing the surrounding area in four panels in which are stamped four double circles Double circles are stamped at the intersections of the straight lines and at the corners of the empty frames as well. A single straight line runs along the edges of the boards. Turn-ins are decorated with concentric frames formed by triple straight lines.
Chainstitch sewing on four sewing stations (two pairs); periodic fold pattern; Z-plied threads. Between each pair of sewing stations there are two lengths of thread.

history.origin: seventeenth–eighteenth century The manuscript is composed of two codicological units. Unit 1, which makes up the major part of the manuscript, can be dated palaeographically to the seventeenth–eighteenth century. Unit 2 is a one-folio fragment of a mid-fifteenth–mid-sixtieth-century manuscript containing . It is probably that Unit 2 became part of the manuscript at the creation of Unit 1. At some point in its history, the manuscript belonged to and, probably at a later point, .
history.acquisition: The manuscript entered the Bodleian Libraries as part of the bequest of after his death in 2011.

msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ሥሉስ፡ ዘእንበለ፡ ፍልጠት፡ ወ፩፡ በጽምረት፡ ኅቡረ፡ ህላዊ፡ ወዕሩየ፡ መለኮት፡ ዘአሐተ፡ ይሰግድ፡ እምኀበ፡ ሰብእ፡ ወመላእክት፨ ንጽሕፍ፡ እንከ፡ ዘንተ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ዘይሠመይ፡ አርጋኖነ፡ ውዳሴ፨ ወመሰንቆ፡ መዝሙር፡ ወእንዚራ፡ ስብሐት፨ ዘአስተብፅዖ፡ ድንግልናሃ፨ ወነጊረ፡ ዕበያ፡ ወአክብሮ፡ ስማ፨ ወሰብሖ፡ ቅድስናሃ፨ ወግናይ፡ ለንግሣ፨ ለቅድስት፡ ወቡርክት፡ ወንጽሕት፡ ማርያም፡ ዘበዕብራይስጢ፡ ማሪሃም፡ ድንግል፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፨ እንተ፡ ይእቲ፡ ሐመረ፡ ወርቅ፡ እሞገደ፡ አስራም፡ እንተ፡ ኢትትሐወክ፡ ወራግናቲሃ፡ ሐብለ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ዘኢይትበተክ፨
msItem.explicit: ኦቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ ሄሮድስ፡ ፈቀደ፡ ይዕፁ፡ ነፋሰ፡ ውስተ፡ ጽርሑ፡ በአይቴ፡ ይትከሀል፡ ዓፂወ፡ ነፋስ፡ ሄሮድስ፡ ፈተወ፡ ይጽብጥ፡ ብርሃነ፡ ፀሐይ፡ በእዴሁ፡ በአይቴ፡ኬ፡ ይትከሀል፡ ፀቢጠ፡ ብርሃነ፡ ፀሐይ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ተዓንገደ፡ ውስተ፡ ምድረ፡ ግብጽ፡ ተሐዚሎ፡ በዘባንኪ፨

msItem.incipit: ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ቅድስት፡ት፡ ድንግል፡ በክልኤ፨ ማርያም፡ ዘበዕብራይስጢ፡ ማርያም፡ ተማኅፀንኩ፡ በዝተአንግዶ፡ አምላክ፡ ምስሌኪ፡ ተዝካረ፡ ጻማኪ፡ በሐዊረ፡ ፍኖት፡ ይቁም፡ ቅድመ፡ ገጹ፡ ለወልድኪ፨
አቀድም፡ አእኵቶቶ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ በእንተ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፨ ወበእንቲአኪኒ፡ እስመ፡ ተሰምዐ፡ ዜና፡ ውዳሴኪ፡ ውስተ፡ ኵሉ፡ ዓለም፨
msItem.explicit: መጠዓዊ፡ ወመስግል፡ ይሠረው፡ ዘስራይ፡ ወመስተቃስም፡ ይደምስሱ፨ ወዘያስምክ፡ በእጓለ፡ እመሕያው፡ በከመ፡ ጽሑፍ፡ ይትረገም፡ ወዘሰ፡ ይትሜካህ፡ በቅዱሰ፡ እስራኤል፡ ወይትዌከል፡ በአምላከ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ወይጼወን፡ በጸሎተ፡ እሙ፡ ድንግል፡

ወአንቲሂ፡ ካዕበ፡ ኦእግዝግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡
ዘበዕብራይስጢ፡ ማሪሃም፡ እሙ፡ ለገባሬ፡ መላእክት፡ ወወላዲቱ፡ ። ፡ ለመስተፅዕነ፡ ኪሩቤል፡ ሰአሊ፡ በእንቲአየ፡ ከመ፡ እትባላህ፡ በጸሎትኪ፡ እመናስወ፡ ዓለም፨ም
msItem.explicit: ወተፈልጠ፡ ለትምህርተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ዘአቅደመ፡ ነጊረ፡ በአፈ፡ ነቢያቲሁ፡ በእንተ፡ ዘተወልደ፡ ወመጽአ፡ እምዘርአ፡ ዳዊት፡ በሥጋ፡ ሰብእ፨ ፨

msItem.incipit: ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ቅድስት፡ት፡ ድንግል፡ በክልኤ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘበዕብራይስጢ፡ ማሪሃም፨ ንዒ፡ ዝየ፡ ምስለ፡ ኵሎሙ፡ ማኅበረ፡ ነቢያት፡ ከመ፡ ታለብወኒ፡ ኃይለ፡ ቃል፨ ዘወፅአ፡ እምአፉሆሙ፡ ለስብሐተ፡ ዚአኪ፡ ኦድንግል፡ ንዒ፡ ኀቤየ፡ ምስለ፡ ኵሎሙ፡ ማኅበረ፡ ነቢያት፡ ወሐዋርያት፡
msItem.explicit: ወእመሂ፡ በሕሊናሁ፡ አነ፡ እፈዲ፡ አስተብቍዖ፡ ወጸሎተ፡ በእንተ፡ ዕዳ፡ ዚአሁ፡ ሣህለ፡ ዚአከ፡ ወምሕረተ፡ አቡከ፡ ወኂሩተ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ይመግቦ፨ በኵሉ፡ መዋዕሊሁ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨

msItem.incipit: እትጋነይ፡ ለዕበይኪ፡ ኦወለተ፡ ዳዊት፡ ወእሰግድ፡ ታሕተ፡ መከድየደ፡ እገርኪ፡ኪ፡ ወእትመሐለል፡ ቅድመ፡ ገጽኪ፡ ኦወለተ፡ ሣህል፡ ግሩር፡ አነ፡ ለንግሠ፡ ወልድኪ፡ ኦወለተ፡ ምሕረት፡ ለይረድ፡ ላዕሌየ፡ ጠለ፡ ምሕረቱ፡ ለፍቁርኪ፨
msItem.explicit: ተፀወንኩ፡ ኪያኪ፡ ከመ፡ ኢይስሐጠኒ፡ አሕፃሆሙ፡ ለመኳንንተ፡ ጽልመት፡ ወእድኅን፡ ካዕበ፡ እምአርማሐ፡ ዓላዊያን፨ ወእምሰይፈ፡ ነኪራን፡ ተፀወንኩ፡ ኪያኪ፡ ከመ፡ እትባላህ፡ እመናግንቲሆሙ፡ ለእለ፡ ይትቃወምዋ፡ ለፍኖተ፡ ጽድቅ፨

msItem.incipit:
ኣሌዕል፡ እደውየ፡ ኀበ፡ ። ፡ ወልድኪ፡ ወእጸርኅ፡ እንዘ፡ እብል፡ ረድ፡ እግዚኦ፡ እምጽርሕከ፡ ወእመቅደስከ፡ ከመ፡ ትባልሐኒ፡ እምኵሉ፡ መከራ፡ ወእምኵሉ፡ ምንዳቤ፨ ረድ፡ እግዚኦ፡ እምድልው፡ ማኅደርከ፡
ከመ፡ ታድኅነኒ፡ እመቅሠፍት፡ እንተ፡ ታጠውቅ፡ ወእምድቀት፡ እንተ፡ አልባቲ፡ ትንሣኤ፨
msItem.explicit: ወለስምዓ፡ ቃላቲሁ፡ ኅቡረ፡ ይምሐረነ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ እስከ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ ወአሜን፤ ለይኩን፡ ለይኩን፨ ፨

support.p: Some holes from parchment making repaired by sewing are present, e.g. on .

extent.note: Data on the dimensions of folios taken from .

layout.note: Data on text area and margin dimensions taken from .
The characters per line per column are 8–11.
layout.ab: Ruling and pricking are visible. Primary pricks are visible and ruling pricks are mostly visible.
The upper and bottom lines are written above the ruling.

handNote.seg: Lines on incipit pages and incipit columns, alternating with black lines; holy names; elements of punctuation marks.

list.item: Omitted letter and words have been added interlineally (e.g. ), in the upper or outer margin (e.g. ), occasionally with a tamallas-sign in the text (e.g. ). There are erasures (e.g. ), effaced words (e.g. ), and deletions marked by encircling or over- and underlining (e.g. ).

item.desc: Aids for identifying the section for each weekday are written in red ink in the upper margin encircled by red dots, sometimes next to erasures (see Varia note 3): ዘሰኑይ (), ዘሠሉስ፡ (), ዘረቡዕ፡ (), ዘሐሙስ፡ (), ዘዐርብ፡ (), ዘቀዳሚት፡ ሰንበት፡ (), ዘሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ().

Secondarily added supplication formulas mentioning have been erased at the end of each weekday section. The supplication formulas were sometimes found inside the textblock, sometimes next to the indications listed in Varia note 2.

msItem.note: The fragment contains the following portions of the text: Isaiah 65:11–14 (), 65:15–22 (; the beginning of verse 22 has been omitted, possibly due to homoeoteleuton, as verse 21 begins similarly), 65:23–66:3 (), 66:3–66:8 ().
msItem.incipit: መልኡ፨ ወአነ፡ እሜጥወክሙ፡ ለኲናት፡ ወትመውቱ፡ ኵልክሙ፡ በመጥባሕት፡ እስመ፡ ጸዋዕኩክሙ፡ ወኢያውሣእክሙ፡ ወነበብኩክሙ፡ ወተጸመምክሙኒ፡ ወገበርክሙ፡ እኩየ፡ በቅድሜየ፡ ወኢፈቀድክሙ፡ አድኅንክሙ፨=፨
msItem.explicit: ስምዑ፡ ቃለ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ እለ፡ ትርዕዳ፡ እምቃሉ በልዎሙ፡ አኃዊነ፡ ለጸላእትክሙ፡ ከመ፡ ይሴባሕ፡ ስመ እግዚኣብሔር፡ ቃለ፡ እግዚኣብሔር፡ ዘይትቤቃል በቃለ፡ እምፀሩ፡ ዘእንበለ ትለድ፡ እንተ፡ ውስተ፡ ማሕምም፡ ወወለደት፡ ተባዕተ፡ መኑ፡ ሰምዐ፡ ከመዝ፡ ወመኑ፡ ርእየ፡ ዘከመዝ፡ ይትወለዱኑ፡ አሕዛብ፡ በምዕር፡

support.p: Small holes from parchment making are present on .

extent.note: The leaf, which originally was larger, has been trimmed to match the size of the leaves of Unit 1.

layout.note: The folio has been erroneously bound, so that the original outer part of the folio is now found in the gut. The lower and current outer part of the folio have been trimmed with loss of text. Based on the amount of text loss, the leaf must originally have contained an additional six to seven written lines.
Due to the trimming of the folio, the extent of the ruling lines and the lower end of the vertical lines cannot be determined.
layout.ab: Ruling is visible; the areas expected to contain traces of pricking are now hidden inside the quire.

handNote.desc: Regular hand with regularly spaced characters.
handNote.seg: Elements of punctuation marks have been rubricated.

history.origin: mid-fifteenth–mid-sixteenth century Unit 2 can be dated palaeographically to the mid-fifteenth–mid-sixteenth century. It presumably became a part of this manuscript at the time of production of Unit 1.
